dogs.name: Elle
dogs.description: Elle is a healthy dog who will make any owner happy to be her owner.

dogs.name: Cooper
dogs.description: Cooper is an energetic dog that'll keep any dog on their tows.

dogs.name: Sophie
dogs.description: Sophie is a sweetheart of a dog that can make you laugh and cry at the same time, in a good way!

dogs.name: Blaster
dogs.description: Blaster loves his ball and an keep you entertained for hours on end.

dogs.name: Max
dogs.description: Max is a husky pup that loves to play!

dogs.name: Boomer
dogs.description: Boomer is a cute chubby dog that will be loyal kind dog.

dogs.name: Chloe
dogs.description: Chloe has lots of energy! She's from the desert and loves to play and take long walks!

dogs.name: Brisket
dogs.description: Brisket is fun pup! He's bonded with his sister, Lola! He love to play fetch and snuggle on the couch!

dogs.name: Lola
dogs.description: Lola is so sweet! She loves to play and is bonded with her brother, Brisket! She likes to counter surf and has eaten a loaf of bread in one sitting.

dogs.name: Holly
dogs.description: Holly is a young energentic pup! She loves to play tug and ball. She is still learning house manners.
